items.title: Elon Musk accused of trying to weaken Europe with support for far-right AfD party
items.description: Germany's vice chancellor said Musk's comments calling the far-right AfD a "last spark of hope" weren't made out of ignorance.

items.title: Remote work impeded women’s careers, CEO of top U.K. bank claims amid industry-wide RTO surge
items.description: "Being seen" is critical to career development, Debbie Crosbie said, arguing that remote work makes female employees appear absent.

items.title: Billion-euro blow for Hungary’s Orban as frozen EU funds are lost

items.title: Employee stock options: 3 things to know
items.description: If options are part of your compensation package, it’s worth your while to get familiar with how they work.
